Name: Funerary statuette (shabti)
Description: Overseer shabti, with the arms crossed at the front and holding hoes. It has a long ankle-length skirt. The face is painted red as are the hands, feet and hoes. The wig, the eyes and the inscription were painted black. It has a three-row blue and red necklace. The front part of the figure is yellow although both the sides and the back shows traces of white paint.
